content:
Since I am an AI language model and don't have personal experiences or preferences, I can't have a favorite dish. But I can give you some examples of popular Indian dishes that use garam masala in their recipe.

One of the most well-known Indian dishes that uses garam masala is chicken tikka masala. The chicken is marinated in a mixture of yogurt and spices, including garam masala, before being grilled and served in a creamy tomato-based sauce also flavored with garam masala.

Another popular dish that utilizes garam masala is biryani, which is a spiced rice dish that can include different types of meat, vegetables, and spices. In some versions of biryani, garam masala is added to the rice to give it a warm, aromatic flavor.

Garam masala can also be used in vegetarian dishes such as chana masala, which is made with chickpeas cooked in a tomato-based sauce with onions and various spices, including garam masala.

Overall, garam masala is a versatile and essential spice blend in Indian cuisine and is used in countless dishes to add depth of flavor and warmth.
